title: Mayura Emerald Haaram: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: Delicate Ruby Accents. Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases the iconic Mayura (Peacock) motif, intricately etched within circular pendants adorned with shimmering CZ diamonds. The design echoes the classic Kasulaperu style, with repeating coin-like elements interspersed with emerald-studded floral connectors. The peacock, a symbol of beauty and prosperity in Telugu culture, is rendered with meticulous detail. Features a secure S-hook clasp. Traditional Nakshi work gives the peacocks character and depth.
colors: Dominant gold tone with vibrant green emeralds
and dazzling white CZ diamonds creating a harmonious and eye-catching palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale social events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Mayura Emerald Haaram is a timeless investment, blending the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry with contemporary design sensibilities. The impeccable craftsmanship, the brilliance of the Zambian Emeralds, and the intricate detailing make it a truly unique piece. A symbol of tradition, beauty, and prosperity, it is destined to become a cherished family heirloom. Its design makes a bold statement while retaining a touch of cultural subtlety.
